entry.title: [RFC] [BIP proposal] Dealing with malleability
entry.summary: On October 2, 2014, Pieter Wuille proposed a document for changing nVersion. He shared the document on GitHub. Pavol Rusnak responded to this proposal by suggesting the complete removal of DER encoding and using just 64 bytes directly for signature. Additionally, he found the use of two different variable integer encodings confusing.
